00019 OptionDialog::OptionDialog(QWidget* parent)
00020     : QDialog(parent)
00021 {
00022     setupUi(this);
00023     m_logger = new Logger(this);
00024 
00025     m_img = NULL;
00026     m_optionWidget = NULL;
00027     m_paletteRed.setColor(QPalette::Base, QColor(255, 204, 204));
00028     m_paletteGreen.setColor(QPalette::Base, QColor(179, 211, 155));
00029 
00030     loadImageFormats();
00031     loadEncryptionTypes();
00032 
00033     setupDialog();
00034     connectSignals();
00035 }

00037 OptionDialog::~OptionDialog()
00038 {
00039     if(m_img!=NULL)
00040         delete(m_img);
00041     delete m_logger;
00042 }

00044 void OptionDialog::setImage(Image* img)
00045 {
00046     if(m_img!=NULL)
00047         delete(m_img);
00048     m_img = new Image(*img);
00049 }
00050 
00051 void OptionDialog::selectFile()
00052 {
00053     setCursor(Qt::WaitCursor);
00054     QFileDialog dialog(this, tr("Save image to"));
00055     dialog.setViewMode(QFileDialog::List);
00056     dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::DirectoryOnly);
00057     dialog.setDirectory(QDir::homePath());
00058     if(dialog.exec())
00059     {
00060         QStringList fileNames = dialog.selectedFiles();
00061         if(fileNames.size()>0)
00062         {
00063             if(QFile::exists(fileNames.at(0)))
00064                 destinationLineEdit->setText(fileNames.at(0));
00065             else
00066                 QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"),
00067                                      fileNames.at(0)+"\n"+
00068                                      "The folder selected doesn't exists.\n"+
00069                                      "Please select an other destination !");
00070         }
00071     }
00072     setCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
00073 }

00075 void OptionDialog::rejected()
00076 {
00077 }
00078 
00079 bool OptionDialog::isDialogReady()
00080 {
00081     if(m_img==NULL)
00082     {
00083         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"),
00084                              "No image has been selected, this is probably an internal error.\n please report it to the developpers.");
00085         return false;
00086     }
00087 
00088     if(cryptoCheckBox->checkState()!=Qt::Unchecked)
00089     {
00090         if(!checkCryptoPassword())
00091         {
00092             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"),
00093                                  "Key for the encryption process have to be valid ! (more than 5 characters)");
00094             return false;
00095         }
00096     }
00097 
00098     return true;
00099 }

00101 FormatModuleInterface* OptionDialog::currentFormatModule()
00102 {
00103     QString format = imageFormatComboBox->currentText();
00104     FormatModuleInterface* module = (FormatModuleInterface*) ModuleManager::get(ModuleManager::IMAGEFORMAT, format);
00105     if(module==NULL) {
00106         m_logger->warning("Cannot find module for " + format + " image format" );
00107     }
00108     return module;
00109 }
00110 
00111 CryptoModuleInterface* OptionDialog::currentCryptoModule()
00112 {
00113     QString type = cryptoComboBox->currentText();
00114     return (CryptoModuleInterface*)ModuleManager::get(ModuleManager::CRYPTO, type);
00115 }
00116 
00117 EncodedData::DataFormat OptionDialog::currentCharset()
00118 {
00119     EncodedData::DataFormat charset = EncodedData::F_UNDEF;
00120     switch(charsetComboBox->currentIndex())
00121     {
00122     case 0:
00123         charset = EncodedData::UTF8;
00124         break;
00125     case 1:
00126         charset = EncodedData::LATIN1;
00127         break;
00128     case 2:
00129         charset = EncodedData::ASCII;
00130         break;
00131     }
00132 
00133     return charset;
00134 }
00135 
00136 void OptionDialog::imageFormatChanged(const QString& imageFormat)
00137 {
00138     FormatModuleInterface* module = (FormatModuleInterface*) ModuleManager::get(ModuleManager::IMAGEFORMAT, imageFormat);
00139     if(module==NULL) {
00140         m_logger->warning("Cannot find module for " + imageFormat + " image format" );
00141         return;
00142     }
00143 
00144     QWidget* w = currentFormatWidget(module);
00145 
00146     if(w!=NULL)
00147     {
00148         if(m_optionWidget!=NULL)
00149             m_optionWidget->setVisible(false);
00150         m_optionWidget = w;
00151         optionsVerticalLayout->insertWidget(0, m_optionWidget);
00152         m_optionWidget->setVisible(true);
00153     }
00154     else
00155         m_logger->warning("The widget for encoding format is NULL");
00156 
00157 }
00158 
00159 bool OptionDialog::checkCryptoPassword()
00160 {
00161     if (cryptoPwd2LineEdit->text().length() == 0)
00162     {
00163         cryptoPwd1LineEdit->setPalette(m_palette);
00164         cryptoPwd2LineEdit->setPalette(m_palette);
00165     }
00166     else if (cryptoPwd2LineEdit->text().length() >= 6
00167              && cryptoPwd1LineEdit->text() == cryptoPwd2LineEdit->text())
00168     {
00169         cryptoPwd1LineEdit->setPalette(m_paletteGreen);
00170         cryptoPwd2LineEdit->setPalette(m_paletteGreen);
00171         return true;
00172     }
00173     else if (cryptoPwd2LineEdit->text().length() <= 6)
00174     {
00175         cryptoPwd1LineEdit->setPalette(m_paletteRed);
00176         cryptoPwd2LineEdit->setPalette(m_paletteRed);
00177     }
00178     return false;
00179 }
00180 
00181 
00182 void OptionDialog::cryptoStatusChanged(int status)
00183 {
00184     if(status==Qt::Unchecked)
00185     {
00186         cryptoWidget->setVisible(false);
00187         cryptoPwd1LineEdit->setText("");
00188         cryptoPwd2LineEdit->setText("");
00189         checkCryptoPassword();
00190         resize(500, 325);
00191     }
00192     else
00193     {
00194         cryptoWidget->setVisible(true);
00195         resize(500, 358);
00196     }
00197 }
00198 
00199 void OptionDialog::cryptoPwd1TextEdited(QString)
00200 {
00201     checkCryptoPassword();
00202 }
00203 
00204 void OptionDialog::cryptoPwd2TextEdited(QString)
00205 {
00206     checkCryptoPassword();
00207 }

00209 void OptionDialog::loadImageFormats()
00210 {
00211     foreach(ModuleInterface* module,
00212             ModuleManager::get(ModuleManager::IMAGEFORMAT))
00213     {
00214         imageFormatComboBox->addItem(module->typeSupported());
00215         if(Controller::config.get("imageformat")==module->typeSupported())
00216         {
00217             imageFormatComboBox->setCurrentIndex(imageFormatComboBox->count()-1);
00218         }
00219     }
00220 }
00221 
00222 void OptionDialog::loadEncryptionTypes()
00223 {
00224     foreach(ModuleInterface* module,
00225             ModuleManager::get(ModuleManager::CRYPTO))
00226     {
00227         cryptoComboBox->addItem(module->typeSupported());
00228         if(Controller::config.get("encryption")==module->typeSupported())
00229         {
00230             cryptoComboBox->setCurrentIndex(cryptoComboBox->count()-1);
00231         }
00232     }
00233 }
00234 
00235 void OptionDialog::setupDialog()
00236 {
00237     cryptoWidget->setVisible(false);
00238 
00239     if(ModuleManager::count(ModuleManager::CRYPTO)<=0)
00240         cryptoCheckBox->setVisible(false);
00241 
00242     if(ModuleManager::count(ModuleManager::IMAGEFORMAT)<=0)
00243     {
00244         imageFormatWidget->setEnabled(false);
00245         okButton->setEnabled(false);
00246     }
00247 
00248     if(Controller::config.get("charset")=="Latin1")
00249         charsetComboBox->setCurrentIndex(1);
00250     else if(Controller::config.get("charset")=="ASCII")
00251         charsetComboBox->setCurrentIndex(2);
00252     else
00253         charsetComboBox->setCurrentIndex(0);
00254 
00255     resize(500, 325);
00256 }
00257 void OptionDialog::connectSignals()
00258 {
00259     connect(okButton, SIGNAL(pressed()), this, SLOT(ok()));
00260     connect(this, SIGNAL(rejected()), this, SLOT(rejected()));
00261     connect(toolButton, SIGNAL(pressed()), this, SLOT(selectFile()));
00262     connect(cryptoCheckBox, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00263             this, SLOT(cryptoStatusChanged(int)));
00264     connect(cryptoPwd1LineEdit, SIGNAL(textEdited(QString)),
00265             this, SLOT(cryptoPwd1TextEdited(QString)));
00266     connect(cryptoPwd2LineEdit, SIGNAL(textEdited(QString)),
00267             this, SLOT(cryptoPwd2TextEdited(QString)));
00268     connect(imageFormatComboBox, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(const QString&)),
00269             this, SLOT(imageFormatChanged(const QString&)));
00270 }
00271 
00272 void OptionDialog::displayModuleException(const QString& title, 
00273                                           const ModuleException e){
00274     QMessageBox msgBox;
00275     msgBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Critical);
00276     msgBox.setWindowTitle(title);
00277     msgBox.setText(e.message());
00278     msgBox.setDetailedText(e.details());
00279     msgBox.exec();
00280 }
